body_html: We have a CMake module to find Cudnn and download it if necessary https://github.com/NVIDIA/torch-cudnn/blob/cudnn-download/cmake/FindCUDNN.cmake. (Caffe2 uses similar detection). Do you want to switch to something like that instead of https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/setup_helpers/cudnn.py ?
